data.message: Did you guys take away the ability to turn chat off for certain people?  I noticed today that I either have to turn it on for everyone or none at all. If that's the case, why would you take away that ability?

replies.message: Hi Natalia. You can decide to turn off chat for only some contacts by clicking on the gear menu at the bottom right of the screen on the chat sidebar and then selecting "Advanced Settings". Keep in mind, this is about using messages on Facebook. For help with the Messenger app or messenger.com, visit the Messenger Help Center at: http://bit.ly/2gT0XLi. -Jessica
Facebook I did that and when I click on advanced settings, I only get the options of turn on for all or turn off for all.
Just a suggestion, but we should have the ability to send you screen shots. That would make it so much easier for both sides.

sebepsiz yere hesaplarım kapanıyor yanlış bir davranışta veya ahlaksız payalşımlarda bulunmuyorum sahte hesap açmıyorum ama devamlıu hesapım kapatılıyor çevrede hesap kapatma koduyla hesap kapatanlar var lütfen yardım edin kimliğimi yolladım hala açılmadı.
